page.title: 03Worlingworth Entertainment
page.content: Q1Who is at the centre of entertainment & sport & how is it organised? A1The Community Council coordinates such activities but anyone can organise use of the field or the pavilion is free except for fund raising events. Q2Give a typical year of activities. A2In the winter,a cabaret.On May Day a fete.In July,a cheese & wine party & an outing for the over 60's.Harvest supper Bonfire Night party & Christmas parties for children & adults. Q3Are there sub-organisations providing specialised facilities? A3Yes Girl Guides,Brownies,Football & Cricket Clubs,Over 60's,British Legion, Womens Institute & Playgroup. Q4Do the villagers work well together when an event is organised? A4They work well together providing they are asked to help.
